long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a discreet app that opens a new window on which you can use Chrome. This window runs no extensions, so it will protect you from extension-based web filters, such as allowing you to bypass Securly. Unlike similar apps, this application blends in better on Chromebooks and allows you to open multiple windows! It also includes an omnibox that uses Google Search.

Please note: This app has no effect if sites are blocked via the wireless access point. It only opens a window without extensions running. If it does not work, then you need to use a proxy or VPN.

www.paypal.me/Typicalness

- create tab system rather than just different windows
